channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Takes A Step Toward Fixing Its Worst Loot Farm
item.description: Destiny 2's Rite of the Nine will be a new, limited-time dungeon-focused event, the first of its kind, and its loot farm sounds good.

item.title: The opposite of a good idea…
item.description: might also be a good idea. The hard part isn’t finding proof before you begin. The hard part is beginning, knowing you might not succeed.

item.title: Microsoft Transforms Communications With Agentic AI Avatars From D-ID
item.description: D-ID real-time AI avatars are adding a visually engaging, natural layer to Microsoft's autonomous AI agents, enhancing customer interactions.

item.title: Lumotive Raises $45M For Chip Scale Light Management Chip
item.description: Lumotive's $45M raise for chip scale light management enables solid-state, software definable LiDAR. Integration with CMOS cameras creates new market ...

item.title: How AI Has Forever Altered Innovation
item.description: The age of AI is here and is rewriting the rules of innovation. The future belongs to those who can effectively combine human creativity and AI.

item.title: The Vital Role Of Humans In AI: A Collaborative Future
item.description: AI may be a transformative force, but it's the human touch that ensures its success.

item.title: … or the highway

item.title: March is strategy month
item.description: January feels like the start of the year, but there’s always a hangover from the holidays. In the northern Hemisphere, February is dark and dreary and...

item.title: Seeking metaphor
item.description: This is how we learn. An apple is a lot like an orange, but you can eat the skin and it’s not as sweet. If you know what an orange is, you’re most of ...
